actions.committee: Senate Committee on Agriculture and Forestry (Subsequently: Agriculture, Nutrition and Forestry)
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Agriculture and Forestry (Subsequently: Agriculture, Nutrition and Forestry).

official_title: A bill to amend the Rural Electrification Act of 1936, as amended, to provide authority for the Administrator of the Rural Electrification Administration to guarantee loans for the furnishing of electric energy for certain municipal electric systems.

summary.text: Amends the Rural Electrification Act of 1936 to authorize the Administrator of the Rural Electrification Administration to guarantee loans to finance construction and operation of electric transmission facilities to provide electrical energy to municipalities with 25,000 inhabitants or less. Stipulates that such loan guarantee authority shall terminate on September 30, 2006.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Rural Electrification Act of 1936, as amended, to provide authority for the Administrator of the Rural Electrification Administration to guarantee loans for the furnishing of electric energy for certain municipal electric systems.
